page.title: 15HOPES AND FEARS - 2.
page.content: b)That the village school remains open.In Butlers Marston school there are less than 40 pupils.Villagers hoped that young children would not have to be "bussed out"to school. c)The older people hoped that there would be more local bus services for O.A.P.s and that the church would retain its hold on the affairs and lives of local inhabitants.Younger people hoped for better leisure facilities.In particular they wanted a public house for Butlers Marston. {What are your fears for this area?} a)That young people will be squeezed out of the village because of poor employment prospects and expensive housing. b)That motorway development will spoil the rural area. c)That the surrounding agricultural land will be overdeveloped.
